description:
Setsuna`s actions have prevented a coup d`etat in the Kingdom of Azadistan, but the conservative leader Massoud Rachmadi remains missing, and the situation continues to worsen. In order to find out who is behind the crisis, Setsuna visits the site of the solar antenna facility, where he encounters the Union ace pilot Graham Aker.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: การกลับมาของนักบุญ
